explanation-1.title: Turn up your business by leveraging the latest location technology
explanation-1.description: Install motio sensors in your retail store to start giving personalized notifications, recommendations and benefits based on micro-location.

explanation-2.title: Our solution
explanation-2.description:
Motio helps retailers leverage the power of mobile to attract and influence consumers while they shop in the store.
It integrates brick and mortar and online channels into one, allowing a retail store to deliver discounts, benefits and content relevant to the customers location while touring the store.

explanation-3.motio-sensor-description: A motio sensor is a wireless device which broadcasts a message that smartphones can capture.
explanation-3.motio-sdk-description: The motio SDK is a library developed for iOS and Android, which traduces captured sensor messages in relevant content.
